required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Outcomes Using the AMO Advanced Customvue™ iLasik Procedure
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Outcomes Using the AMO Advanced Customvue™ iLasik Procedure (Wavescan Wavefront® System, Star S4 IR™ Excimer Laser System and Intralse™ FS System)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy, predictability and safety of the Advanced CustomVue™ iLASIK procedure (WaveScan WaveFront® System, STAR S4 IR™ Excimer Laser System and IntraLase™ FS System). Patient data will be collected electronically and analyzed to determine improvements in postoperative visual acuity, visual quality and residual error.

primary_outcome.measure: Postoperative visit procedures will include visual acuity and quality assessments and monitoring for surgical complications necessitating retreatment.

intervention.intervention_name: WaveScan WaveFront® System, STAR S4 IR™ Excimer Laser System and IntraLase™ FS System

responsible_party.organization: The Center for Excellence in Eye Care

clinical_study.keyword: Assess the efficacy, predictability and safety of the Advanced CustomVue™ iLASIK procedure.
